title: Howard Stern (Extended Cut) | Colbert Classic
description:
In his first appearance on the 'Late Show' since his days sitting across from Letterman, 'Howard Stern Comes Again' author Howard Stern tells Stephen about his most memorable interviews, psychotherapy, and more. Enjoy this extended interview featuring portions of the conversation that didn't make it to air.
